Additionally, customers like the color options, with one highlighting the nice copper tone, and they describe it as comfortable and chic. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday dress!
items.body: Material is on the thinner side but beautiful dress. Great for the holidays. I ordered a small and I am almost 8 months pregnant. Has stretch and very comfortable. Would highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Kimberly Hamrick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfortable dress
items.body: Please excuse the streaky mirror. This is a great dress! I bought it in the sage green, XL and I’m so happy I may get in another color as well. It’ll be perfect for a holiday party later this year. I’m 5’9, 210 lbs and 40C and the XL is perfect. I’ll probably wear shape wear just to smooth things out a bit but that’s just a preference- the photos here are without. The dress is very comfortable and a good length. There is no major pulling at the top where the snap is but I may add a garment tape strip just to keep the fabric laying flat. I tried the sleeves a couple different ways but I think I prefer them all the way down. It’s cute either way though! All in all, a very cute comfortable classy dress for a work event or holiday party! Read more
items.author: KP

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, stretchy, flattering
items.body: The "sage" color is a lovely teal. Dress is comfy and stretchy, but a little short (and I am extremely short). It's fine when standing up but as soon as you sit down you might show all the goodies, so be careful! I removed the chest snap closure and added a stitch to keep it shut at a more flattering position. I also removed the tie belt as I thought it made the dress look like a robe, and added a silver belt to match my shoes. Much cuter and more formal. Wore it to a wedding and there was another guest with the same dress in a different color haha. I removed a star as the dress is EXTREMELY OVERPRICED! Should be $29 at most. Read more
items.author: shhh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PETITE FRIENDLY!!!
items.body: This dress is proportioned so well through the shoulders to waist AND the tulip cut brings up the length to just above the knee! I’m 5’2, 130-135lbs, 36C, 40” hips with a short waist wearing a medium. It drapes nicely without pulling weird. At first I thought I might want to size down to a small, but the longer I’ve worn it I really like the way the slightly more relaxed medium falls. The burnt orange has a really nice copper tone. I was worried the velvet would appear so heavy that it overpowered my petite frame, but the ribbed pattern really breaks it up nicely so light reflects off it in such a way that it actually softens the weight. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but neckline wasn't flattering
items.body: I ordered this dress for a Christmas party I was attending. I am 5;9" 130 lb and ordered a small. It fit well and was comfortable, but I ultimately returned because the neckline was not flattering at all. It included a snap closure halfway up which when snapped gave a weird look to the overall dress. If left unsnapped I liked it better, but then you could see the snap on the edge of the dress. Read more
items.author: Robin Haas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and comfortable dress.
items.body: Very cute and comfortable dress. Soft stretchy fabric seems decent quality. I did, unfortunately have to return it because it just wasn't right for my 'rectangle' body type. It seemed to accentuate my slim hips, no waist and thick upper body. It would be gorgeous on if I had some nice hips to fill it out LOL Read more
items.author: mrsmac

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a holiday party
items.body: Flattering and doesn't wrinkle! Read more
items.author: Emily H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dress!
items.body: Love the color and fit! Read more
items.author: Nancy Miller

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Strip Velvet A-velvet Sage Green (Faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Cherry Blossom (Faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Wine Red(faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Burnt Orange(faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Emerald Green(faux Wrap), Waffle-Shaped Velvet Wine Red, Strip Velvet A-velvet Black(faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Dark Rose (Faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Mulberry (Faux Wrap), Strip Velvet A-velvet Navy(faux Wrap). If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
